name: Projectile-Based Platformer
description:
last night i was bored and i made a prototype it doesn't have a hud but the controls are as follows: 

- WASD to move + mouse to look around + space to jump

- HOLD left click to shoot platform pill (let go to explode it) 

- Right click to pick up platform (you only get few pick ups)

- Q/E to switch type if available 

- R TO RESTART LEVEL

The different platforms are:

- Normal Platform (X): a platform you can stand on

- Bounce Platform (O): a platform that conserves 100% of your downward velocity and bounces you up

- Teleport Pill (o): teleports you upon detonation of the pill

- Explosion Pill (): explodes on detonation, pushing you away!
